citeinfo.title: PA Explorer: Terrabyte Image
citeinfo.othercit: Produced in cooperation with the National Gap Analysis Program, the National Biological Service/US Geologic Survey Biological Resources Division and the Pennsylvania Mapping and Geographic Information Consortium.

cntperp.cntorg: Office for Remote Sensing of Earth Resources

dataqual.complete: Data is tentative, now in the process of being ground checked. A supplement to the original dataset may be issued when ground check has been completed.

srcinfo.srccontr: Original 6 band Landsat scenes, thermal infrared band was not included. Data was transferred to PSU from the EROS Data Center, Sioux Falls, SD. on 8mm magnetic tape.

citeinfo.title: Terrabyte Images of Pennsylvania
citeinfo.othercit: Produced in cooperation with the National Gap Analysis Program, the National Biological Service/US Geologic Survey Biological Resources Division and the Pennsylvania Mapping and Geographic Information Corsortium.

srcinfo.srccontr: Intermediate dataset consisting of 10 Terrabyte images clipped to the Pennsylvania borders. This was cut by county to produce the current dataset.

procstep.procdesc: All tiles were purchased from EOSAT by the MultiResolution Land Characteristics Consortium and were terrain corrected at EROS. Data extracted through the SpectraPlex Process and clipped to Pennsylvania boundaries.

cntperp.cntorg: Office for Remote Sensing of Earth Resources

procstep.procdesc: Original Terrabyte images were reprojected to Lambert Conformal Conic projection and converted to ESRI shapefile format.

cntperp.cntorg: Office for Remote Sensing of Earth Resources
